entry.def: Scrubland is an area of land which is covered with low trees and bushes.

example.ex: Thousands of acres of forests and scrubland have been burnt.
example.tran: 已经有数千英亩森林和灌木丛林地被烧毁。

means.word_mean: 1. an uncultivated region covered with scrub vegetation
